name: Waterfall
description: You create an intense waterfall that crashes down on creatures in a 10 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Creatures in the area must make a STR save against your Move DC or take 2d6 + MOVE water damage and fall prone on a fail, or half as much on a save.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
